conversion_verification.notes: Excellent isometric cutaway. Structural geometry is fully realized.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Perfect 3D transformation with consistent wall thickness and clear room volume.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Room adjacencies and proportions match the source exactly. Bathroom/Utility area has minor layout simplification but remains faithful.

interior_elements.notes: All furniture assets correspond to the 2D plan types and locations, including kitchen appliances.

visual_clarity.notes: Professional quality render. Materials and lighting are consistent; background is clean.

detected_errors.description: The toilet fixture style is simplified compared to the detailed plan, but spatial placement is correct.

summary: An exceptionally faithful 3D conversion that preserves the exact geometry, furniture layout, and spatial logic of the technical floor plan.
